overview: Collection of five short films from Falcon Studios. "Abducted" (a.k.a. "Abduction," "Working On The Railroad") — A hot, curious man is abducted by two rippling-muscled railroad workers. "Star Struck" (a.k.a. "Star Suck") — An explosion of sexual energy after a horny guy meets a real life porn star. "Buddies" (a.k.a. "Old Buddies") — Two buddies unleash their man-lust on each other. "Light My Fire" — On a rug next to a fireplace, two jocks light each other's fire. "Redwood Solo" — Against a backdrop of towering redwoods, a sweaty stud works his giant tool to the towering heights of excitement.
title: Abducted
